title: Coke Boys 3
text:
Coke Boys 3: Niggas Wit Coke (or simply Coke Boys 3) is a <a href="mixtape%23In%20hip%20hop">mixtape</a> by <a href="Americans">American</a> <a href="hip%20hop">hip hop</a> group Coke Boys, released on April 13, 2012. The mixtape features appearances from members signed to the Coke Boys Records label including <a href="Chinx">Chinx Drugz</a>, Charlie Rock, Cheeze, and Flip, alongside guest appearances from <a href="Rick%20Ross">Rick Ross</a>, <a href="Akon">Akon</a>, <a href="Mac%20Miller">Mac Miller</a>, <a href="Wale%20%28rapper%29">Wale</a>, <a href="Red%20Caf%C3%A9">Red Café</a>, Stack Bundles, and other rappers.
References.
[king drakko]
